message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,500 is unfortunately below my minimum price point.  I'm willing to come down a bit from my initial offer.  How about $13,000?  This would still leave you a good deal, considering the value you place on the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $11,500 and $13,000. How about $12,250?
